Schmidts allegedly arranged for less exercise equipment than was paid for to be delivered to Iraq. Eric Schmidt , who was deployed to Iraq in 2008, received bribes from Iraqi vendors, according to court documents. The Schmidts defrauded U.S. taxpayers, cheated the Iraqi people and betrayed the trust placed in them, said Stuart Bowen , special inspector general for Iraq Reconstruction.

What I was more concerned about the ratings falling off a cliff, and that the whole genre might be over.
